version_description:
- v.1.7.1 - 1.7.2:
Various bug fixes and improvements

- v.1.7:
For the first time, play all levels for free! Earn candies as you play and gain access to all 7 level packs with a total of 175 levels!

- v.1.7.1 - 1.7.3:
Various bug fixes and improvements

- v.1.7:
For the first time, play all levels for free! Earn candies as you play and gain access to all 7 level packs with a total of 175 levels!

- v.1.7.1 - 1.7.4:
Various bug fixes and improvements

- v.1.7:
For the first time, play all levels for free! Earn candies as you play and gain access to all 7 level packs with a total of 175 levels!
It’s time to update! ZeptoLab apps are being updated to support iOS8.
Re-greased the robotic arm — good as new!
Filled rockets with fresh gunpowder — now they fly better.
A small update to make sure the game runs smoothly on iOS 9.
Replaced the suction cups — holding good now.
Replaced the suction cups — holding good now.
It gets sweeter every time! Extra eye candy has been added to our cartoons to make them even more delicious. Never miss an episode of Om Nom Stories!
Replaced the suction cups — holding good now.
Re-greased the robotic arm — good as new!
Readjusted the rope guns — now they always hit the bullseye.
